sect2.title: Alnum
sect2.para: Zend_Filter_Alnum is a filter which returns only alphabetic characters and digits. All other characters are supressed.

sect3.title: Supported options for Zend_Filter_Alnum
sect3.para: The following options are supported for Zend_Filter_Alnum:

listitem.para: allowwhitespace: If this option is set then whitespace characters are allowed. Otherwise they are supressed. Per default whitespaces are not allowed.

note.para: Zend_Filter_Alnum works on almost all languages. But actually there are three exceptions: Chinese, Japanese and Korean. Within these languages the english alphabet is use instead of the characters from these languages. The language itself is detected by using Zend_Locale.
